amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to require the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to pay back the Federal cost share for projects carried out under section 593 of the Water Resources Development Act of 1999 in the next fiscal year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
